title: KSMHA Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for 02 Consultant Posts
description: The Karnataka State Mental Health Authority (KSMHA) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies to fill the vacancies of 02 Programme Consultant, Legal Consultant Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, MD/MS, DNB, LLB can apply for the KSMHA Notification 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentio...
